original_text: Every thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh, which they bring unto the Lord, whether it be of men or beasts, shall be thine: nevertheless the firstborn of man shalt thou surely redeem, and the firstling of unclean beasts shalt thou redeem.
korean_text: 여호와께 드리는 모든 생물의 처음 나는 것은 사람이나 짐승이나 다 네 것이로되 처음 태어난 사람은 반드시 대속할 것이요 처음 태어난 부정한 짐승도 대속할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Every thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 육체 중에서 태를 여는 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: which they bring unto the Lord
whether it be of men or beasts
and the firstling of unclean beasts
